line: out of all of us who do you think is gonna get married next

i just i didn’t know that you are a lesbian

okay it just seems pretty wild and you’re so y’know so vanilla

‘cause my part’s just in the beginning i’m not even in the rest of the show wedding
i vamp a little ‘til they get there

an invitation for the at first sight premiere

i wear it like this when i marry you guys and then this is for party time
i am telling you it happened

of course i remember our kiss
i think about it all the time
i can still hear the coconuts knockin’ together i i just didn’t want to tell you ‘cause i didn’t think that you’d return my love and now that you have
